content:
Prime Minister of Ukraine Denis Shmigal discussed with Senior Director of the Eurasian Center of the Atlantic Council John Herbsto and Senior Researcher at the Gouver Institute of Stanford University Philip Zelip Zelikov confiscation of frozen Russian assets for the restoration and needs of Ukraine.

He is about itreportedTelegram.

“Practical steps have been discussed to realize our goal. In particular, economic, political and legal grounds for confiscation of both sovereign assets of Russia and Russian oligarchs, as well as the idea of implementation after the victory of special tax on Russian resources, such as oil, gas and others, ”Denis Shmigal said.

He stressed that Russia should pay.

"We work with experts and partners to realize this principle into life," the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, Josep BorrelsuggestedEU members to send 90% of the profit from the assets of the Russian Federation for military assistance to Ukraine.
title: The head of government discussed with international experts the confiscation of frozen assets of the Russian Federation in favor of Ukraine
description: He reported this in Telegram. “They discussed practical steps to realize our ...
author: Army Inform
